verses.verse: ( Teachings about Divorce) ( ( 480 10:1-12 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto - ὅτε <WG3753> hote When ἐτέλεσεν <WG5055> etelesen had finished ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus τοὺς <WG3588> tous . . . λόγους <WG3056> logous . . . , τούτους <WG3778> toutous saying these things μετῆρεν <WG3332> metēren He left ἀπὸ <WG575> apo . . . τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Γαλιλαίας <WG1056> Galilaias Galilee καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen went εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὰ <WG3588> ta the ὅρια <WG3725> horia region τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Ἰουδαίας <WG2449> Ioudaias of Judea πέραν <WG4008> peran beyond τοῦ <WG3588> tou the Ἰορδάνου <WG2446> Iordanou Jordan .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἠκολούθησαν <WG190> ēkolouthēsan followed αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him , ὄχλοι <WG3793> ochloi crowds πολλοί <WG4183> polloi Large καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐθεράπευσεν <WG2323> etherapeusen He healed αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous them ἐκεῖ <WG1563> ekei there .

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then προσῆλθον <WG4334> prosēlthon came αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - Φαρισαῖοι <WG5330> Pharisaioi [some] Pharisees πειράζοντες <WG3985> peirazontes [and] tested αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him καὶ <WG2532> kai - λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes by asking Εἰ <WG1487> Ei vvv , ἔξεστιν <WG1832> exestin “ Is it lawful ‹ἀνθρώπῳ› <WG444> anthrōpō for a man ἀπολῦσαι <WG630> apolysai to divorce τὴν <WG3588> tēn - γυναῖκα <WG1135> gynaika wife αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his κατὰ <WG2596> kata for πᾶσαν <WG3956> pasan any αἰτίαν <WG156> aitian reason ? ”

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - ἀποκριθεὶς <WG611> apokritheis [Jesus] answered εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen - , Οὐκ <WG3756> Ouk “ vvv ἀνέγνωτε <WG314> anegnōte Have you not read ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ὁ <WG3588> ho the κτίσας <WG2936> ktisas Creator ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ from ἀρχῆς <WG746> archēs [the] beginning Ἄρσεν <WG730> Arsen male καὶ <WG2532> kai and θῆλυ <WG2338> thēly female , ’ ( ; ) ἐποίησεν <WG4160> epoiēsen ‘ made αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous them

καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen said , Ἕνεκα <WG1752> Heneka ‘ For this reason τούτου <WG3778> toutou . . . καταλείψει <WG2641> kataleipsei will leave ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos a man τὸν <WG3588> ton [his] πατέρα <WG3962> patera father καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὴν <WG3588> tēn - μητέρα <WG3384> mētera mother καὶ <WG2532> kai and κολληθήσεται <WG2853> kollēthēsetai be united to τῇ <WG3588> tē - γυναικὶ <WG1135> gynaiki wife , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔσονται <WG1510> esontai will become οἱ <WG3588> hoi the δύο <WG1417> dyo two εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . σάρκα <WG4561> sarka flesh ’ ? ( (see also LXX)) μίαν <WG1520> mian one

ὥστε <WG5620> hōste So οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi no longer εἰσὶν <WG1510> eisin they are δύο <WG1417> dyo two , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but σὰρξ <WG4561> sarx flesh . μία <WG1520> mia one ὃ <WG3739> ho what οὖν <WG3767> oun Therefore ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God συνέζευξεν <WG4801> synezeuxen has joined together , ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos [let] man μὴ <WG3361> mē not χωριζέτω <WG5563> chōrizetō separate . ”

Λέγουσιν <WG3004> Legousin they asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , Τί <WG5101> Ti “ Why οὖν <WG3767> oun then , ” Μωϋσῆς <WG3475> Mōusēs “ did Moses ἐνετείλατο <WG1781> eneteilato order [a man] δοῦναι <WG1325> dounai to give [his wife] βιβλίον <WG975> biblion a certificate ἀποστασίου <WG647> apostasiou of divorce καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀπολῦσαι <WG630> apolysai send [her] away ‹αὐτήν› <WG846> autēn . . . ? ” ( See .)

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei Jesus replied αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois - Ὅτι <WG3754> Hoti - , Μωϋσῆς <WG3475> Mōusēs “ Moses πρὸς <WG4314> pros because of τὴν <WG3588> tēn - σκληροκαρδίαν <WG4641> sklērokardian hardness of heart ; ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἐπέτρεψεν <WG2010> epetrepsen permitted ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἀπολῦσαι <WG630> apolysai to divorce τὰς <WG3588> tas - γυναῖκας <WG1135> gynaikas wives ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn your ἀπ’ <WG575> ap’ from ἀρχῆς <WG746> archēs [the] beginning . δὲ <WG1161> de but οὐ <WG3756> ou not γέγονεν <WG1096> gegonen [it] was οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs this way

λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell δὲ <WG1161> de Now ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ὃς <WG3739> hos whoever ἂν <WG302> an . . . ἀπολύσῃ <WG630> apolysē divorces τὴν <WG3588> tēn - γυναῖκα <WG1135> gynaika wife , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou his μὴ <WG3361> mē except ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi for πορνείᾳ <WG4202> porneia sexual immorality , καὶ <WG2532> kai and γαμήσῃ <WG1060> gamēsē marries ἄλλην <WG243> allēn another woman , μοιχᾶται <WG3429> moichatai commits adultery . ” ( SBL and BYZ include And he who marries a divorced woman commits adultery; see .)

Λέγουσιν <WG3004> Legousin said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to Him , οἱ <WG3588> hoi - μαθηταί <WG3101> mathētai disciples [αὐτοῦ] <WG846> autou His Εἰ <WG1487> Ei “ If οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs this ἐστὶν <WG1510> estin is ἡ <WG3588> hē the αἰτία <WG156> aitia case τοῦ <WG3588> tou between ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou a man μετὰ <WG3326> meta [and] τῆς <WG3588> tēs [his] γυναικός <WG1135> gynaikos wife , οὐ <WG3756> ou not συμφέρει <WG4851> sympherei it is better γαμῆσαι <WG1060> gamēsai to marry . ”

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen He replied αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . , Οὐ <WG3756> Ou “ Not πάντες <WG3956> pantes everyone χωροῦσιν <WG5562> chōrousin can accept τὸν <WG3588> ton - λόγον <WG3056> logon word , ” τοῦτον <WG3778> touton this ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ “ but only [those] οἷς <WG3739> hois to whom δέδοται <WG1325> dedotai it has been given .

εἰσὶν <WG1510> eisin there are γὰρ <WG1063> gar For εὐνοῦχοι <WG2135> eunouchoi eunuchs οἵτινες <WG3748> hoitines who ἐκ <WG1537> ek vvv κοιλίας <WG2836> koilias vvv μητρὸς <WG3384> mētros vvv ἐγεννήθησαν <WG1080> egennēthēsan were born οὕτως <WG3779> houtōs that way ; καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἰσὶν <WG1510> eisin - εὐνοῦχοι <WG2135> eunouchoi [others] οἵτινες <WG3748> hoitines - εὐνουχίσθησαν <WG2134> eunouchisthēsan were made [that way] ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo by τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn men ; καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἰσὶν <WG1510> eisin - εὐνοῦχοι <WG2135> eunouchoi [still others] οἵτινες <WG3748> hoitines - εὐνούχισαν <WG2134> eunouchisan live like eunuchs ἑαυτοὺς <WG1438> heautous vvv διὰ <WG1223> dia for the sake of τὴν <WG3588> tēn the βασιλείαν <WG932> basileian kingdom τῶν <WG3588> tōn of οὐρανῶν <WG3772> ouranōn heaven . ὁ <WG3588> ho The [one] δυνάμενος <WG1410> dynamenos who can χωρεῖν <WG5562> chōrein accept [this] χωρείτω <WG5562> chōreitō should accept [it] . ”

( Jesus Blesses the Children) ( ( 480 10:13-16 ; 490 18:15-17 )) Τότε <WG5119> Tote Then προσηνέχθησαν <WG4374> prosēnechthēsan were brought αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to [Jesus] παιδία <WG3813> paidia [the] little children ἵνα <WG2443> hina for τὰς <WG3588> tas - χεῖρας <WG5495> cheiras [His] hands ἐπιθῇ <WG2007> epithē Him to place αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois on them καὶ <WG2532> kai and προσεύξηται <WG4336> proseuxētai pray [for them] . οἱ <WG3588> hoi the δὲ <WG1161> de And μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples ἐπετίμησαν <WG2008> epetimēsan rebuked αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois those [who brought them] .

ὁ <WG3588> ho - δὲ <WG1161> de But Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen said , Ἄφετε <WG863> Aphete “ Let τὰ <WG3588> ta the παιδία <WG3813> paidia little children καὶ <WG2532> kai and μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv κωλύετε <WG2967> kōlyete do not hinder αὐτὰ <WG846> auta them ! ἐλθεῖν <WG2064> elthein come πρός <WG4314> pros to με <WG1473> me Me , τῶν <WG3588> tōn to γὰρ <WG1063> gar For τοιούτων <WG5108> toioutōn such as these . ” ἐστὶν <WG1510> estin belongs ἡ <WG3588> hē the βασιλεία <WG932> basileia kingdom τῶν <WG3588> tōn of οὐρανῶν <WG3772> ouranōn heaven

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐπιθεὶς <WG2007> epitheis after He had placed τὰς <WG3588> tas [His] χεῖρας <WG5495> cheiras hands αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois on them , ἐπορεύθη <WG4198> eporeuthē He went on ἐκεῖθεν <WG1564> ekeithen from there .

( The Rich Young Man) ( ( 480 10:17-31 ; 490 18:18-30 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Just then ἰδοὺ <WG2400> idou . . . εἷς <WG1520> heis a man προσελθὼν <WG4334> proselthōn came up αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to [Jesus] εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen [and] inquired , Διδάσκαλε <WG1320> Didaskale “ Teacher , τί <WG5101> ti what ἀγαθὸν <WG18> agathon good [thing] ποιήσω <WG4160> poiēsō must I do ἵνα <WG2443> hina to σχῶ <WG2192> schō obtain ζωὴν <WG2222> zōēn life ? ” αἰώνιον <WG166> aiōnion eternal

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen [Jesus] replied αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . . Τί <WG5101> Ti “ Why με <WG1473> me Me ἐρωτᾷς <WG2065> erōtas do you ask περὶ <WG4012> peri about τοῦ <WG3588> tou what is ἀγαθοῦ <WG18> agathou good ? ” ( BYZ and TR 16...“Good Teacher, what good thing must I do to obtain eternal life?” 17“Why do you call Me good?” See and .) εἷς <WG1520> heis only One ἐστιν <WG1510> estin “ There is ὁ <WG3588> ho who is ἀγαθός <WG18> agathos good . εἰ <WG1487> ei If δὲ <WG1161> de - θέλεις <WG2309> theleis you want εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ζωὴν <WG2222> zōēn life , εἰσελθεῖν <WG1525> eiselthein to enter τήρησον* <WG5083> tērēson keep τὰς <WG3588> tas the ἐντολάς <WG1785> entolas commandments . ”

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei [the man] asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . . Ποίας <WG4169> Poias “ Which [ones] ? ” Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν* <WG2036> eipen answered , Τὸ <WG3588> To - Οὐ <WG3756> Ou vvv φονεύσεις <WG5407> phoneuseis “‘ Do not murder , Οὐ <WG3756> Ou vvv μοιχεύσεις <WG3431> moicheuseis do not commit adultery , Οὐ <WG3756> Ou vvv κλέψεις <WG2813> klepseis do not steal , Οὐ <WG3756> Ou vvv ψευδομαρτυρήσεις <WG5576> pseudomartyrēseis do not bear false witness ,

Τίμα <WG5091> Tima honor τὸν <WG3588> ton [your] πατέρα <WG3962> patera father καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὴν <WG3588> tēn - μητέρα <WG3384> mētera mother , καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἀγαπήσεις <WG25> Agapēseis love τὸν <WG3588> ton - πλησίον <WG4139> plēsion neighbor σου <WG4771> sou your ὡς <WG5613> hōs as σεαυτόν <WG4572> seauton yourself .’ ” ( ; ; )

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei said αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . . ὁ <WG3588> ho the νεανίσκος <WG3495> neaniskos young man Ταῦτα <WG3778> Tauta “ vvv πάντα <WG3956> panta All these ἐφύλαξα <WG5442> ephylaxa I have kept , ” τί <WG5101> ti “ What ἔτι <WG2089> eti vvv ὑστερῶ <WG5302> hysterō do I still lack ? ”

Ἔφη <WG5346> Ephē told αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus Εἰ <WG1487> Ei “ If θέλεις <WG2309> theleis you want τέλειος <WG5046> teleios perfect , εἶναι <WG1510> einai to be ὕπαγε <WG5217> hypage go , πώλησόν <WG4453> pōlēson sell σου <WG4771> sou your τὰ <WG3588> ta - ὑπάρχοντα <WG5225> hyparchonta possessions καὶ <WG2532> kai and δὸς <WG1325> dos give [τοῖς] <WG3588> tois to the πτωχοῖς <WG4434> ptōchois poor , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἕξεις <WG2192> hexeis you will have θησαυρὸν <WG2344> thēsauron treasure ἐν <WG1722> en in οὐρανοῖς <WG3772> ouranois heaven . καὶ <WG2532> kai Then δεῦρο <WG1204> deuro come , ἀκολούθει <WG190> akolouthei follow μοι <WG1473> moi Me . ”

Ἀκούσας <WG191> Akousas heard δὲ <WG1161> de [When] ὁ <WG3588> ho the νεανίσκος <WG3495> neaniskos young man τὸν <WG3588> ton - λόγον <WG3056> logon - , (τοῦτον) <WG3778> touton this ἀπῆλθεν <WG565> apēlthen he went away λυπούμενος <WG3076> lypoumenos in sorrow , ἦν <WG1510> ēn he γὰρ <WG1063> gar because ἔχων <WG2192> echōn had κτήματα <WG2933> ktēmata wealth . πολλά <WG4183> polla great

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de Then Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen said τοῖς <WG3588> tois to μαθηταῖς <WG3101> mathētais disciples , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His Ἀμὴν <WG281> Amēn “ Truly λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - πλούσιος <WG4145> plousios a rich man δυσκόλως <WG1423> dyskolōs it is hard for εἰσελεύσεται <WG1525> eiseleusetai to enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn the βασιλείαν <WG932> basileian kingdom τῶν <WG3588> tōn of οὐρανῶν <WG3772> ouranōn heaven .

πάλιν <WG3825> palin Again δὲ <WG1161> de vvv λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , εὐκοπώτερόν <WG2123> eukopōteron easier for ἐστιν <WG1510> estin [it] is κάμηλον <WG2574> kamēlon a camel διὰ <WG1223> dia through τρυπήματος <WG5169> trypēmatos [the] eye ῥαφίδος <WG4476> rhaphidos of a needle εἰσελθεῖν <WG1525> eiselthein to pass ἢ <WG2228> ē than for πλούσιον <WG4145> plousion a rich man [εἰσελθεῖν] <WG1525> eiselthein to enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὴν <WG3588> tēn the βασιλείαν <WG932> basileian kingdom τοῦ <WG3588> tou of Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God . ”

Ἀκούσαντες <WG191> Akousantes heard this , δὲ <WG1161> de When οἱ <WG3588> hoi the μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples ἐξεπλήσσοντο <WG1605> exeplēssonto astonished σφόδρα <WG4970> sphodra they were greatly λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes [and] asked , Τίς <WG5101> Tis “ Who ἄρα <WG686> ara then δύναται <WG1410> dynatai can σωθῆναι <WG4982> sōthēnai be saved ? ”

Ἐμβλέψας <WG1689> Emblepsas looked at [them] δὲ <WG1161> de - ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen [and] said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . , Παρὰ <WG3844> Para “ With ἀνθρώποις <WG444> anthrōpois man τοῦτο <WG3778> touto this ἀδύνατόν <WG102> adynaton impossible , ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is παρὰ <WG3844> para with δὲ <WG1161> de but Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God πάντα <WG3956> panta all things [are] δυνατά <WG1415> dynata possible . ”

Τότε <WG5119> Tote - ἀποκριθεὶς <WG611> apokritheis replied ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Ἰδοὺ <WG2400> Idou “ Look , ” ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis “ we ἀφήκαμεν <WG863> aphēkamen have left πάντα <WG3956> panta everything καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἠκολουθήσαμέν <WG190> ēkolouthēsamen to follow σοι <WG4771> soi You . τί <WG5101> ti What ἄρα <WG686> ara then ἔσται <WG1510> estai will there be ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin for us ? ”
